title: Majo no Marie wa Majo ja Nai
original_name: 魔女のマリーは魔女じゃない
sinopse:
When a witch is found, they are immediately tortured and executed. In the heyday of witch hunting, Marie, a witch who has lived her entire life while hiding her true identity, is forced to change her life after encountering a member of the Church.

(Source: MAG Garden, translated)
